correlation_rules.rule: full_text elements are the CANONICAL SPINE — preserve ALL IDs exactly (elem_001, elem_002, etc.)
NEVER modify, merge, rename, or omit full_text elements
Every correlation MUST have explicit evidence — do not guess or assume relationships
If no clear relationship exists between elements, do not fabricate one
Enrichments attach INSIDE each element's enrichments block, not as separate sections
For figures: identify "referenced_by" (text that cites it), "illustrates" (text it visualizes), "grounded_to" (the figure element itself)
Include the full structure from diagram/table/chart analyzers in the enrichment — do not summarize or truncate
Build cross_reference_index for efficient downstream lookup by diagram, table, or layout region
Include raw_outputs section with S3 URIs of all source analyzer results
Summary should be 2-4 sentences describing what was correlated and key findings
